name: Project: HL
description:
This is a project in which I am trying to replicate my favourite game Half-Life.

Warning: This is still under very early development!

Controls

  • WASD - move
  • CTRL - crouch
  • E - interact
  • R - reload
  • F - flashlight
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Hold Middle Mouse - Grab Objects
  • Scroll/1,2,3... - switch weapon
  • Q - throw grenade
